org.canova.image.mnist

Class MnistImageFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.RandomAccessFile
      • org.canova.image.mnist.MnistDbFile
        • org.canova.image.mnist.MnistImageFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MnistImageFile
extends MnistDbFile
    MNIST database image file. Contains additional header information for the number of rows and columns per each entry.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates new MNIST database image file ready for reading.
